<title level="1" right="Trait">[Acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=524)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 452 <sup>2.0</sup>

Effects with this trait deal acid damage. Creatures with this trait have a connection to magical acid.
name: Acid
